ygData.subject: Re: Unsubscribing....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Go to www.onelist.com and enter your email address and password go to member services and click on either unsubscribe.  There is also an option to not
ygData.messageBody:
Ken Lee wrote:

> Can someone post me the url to unsubscribe? I'll be leaving on
> vacation for two weeks and I don't want work calling me while I'm on
> the beach asking me what the hell 300+ emails are pending in the
> server... : ) Not gone for good, just gone for two
> weeks.... Zalbar15th WizardSolusek Ro

Go to www.onelist.com and enter your email address and password
go to member services and click on either unsubscribe. There is also an
option to not recieve emails, but remain subscribed.
